title: Vision Series A
description: Designed for high-speed applications requiring full-range image scanning and stitching, the A Series offers unmatched precision for large-scale inspections.
features: Specifically designed for products requiring full-range size measurements - PCBs, FPCs, HDI boards, IC carrier, boards, mass-produced 3C products, and more
Supports a flexible combination of multiple lenses and cameras addressing the combined requirements of efficiency and precision in various measurement environments
Optional additional sensors and lasers available for precise height difference and flatness measurements
Includes advanced and comprehensive metrology assessment
Fully automated programming functions, SPC, and more

title: Vision Series F
description: The F Series sets the benchmark for next-generation efficiency with its high-speed stroboscopic measurement capabilities, ideal for rapid throughput environments.
features: Satisfies the full-range measurement requirements for high-density, high-precision products, including Mini-LEDs, IC carrier boards, photovoltaic components, and more.
Optional additional sensors and lasers available for precise height difference and flatness measurements
Includes advanced and comprehensive metrology assessment
Advanced stroboscopic synchronous electric control system
Fully automated programming functions, SPC, and more

title: Vision Series B
description: Engineered for instantaneous measurements of a large number of micron-sized features. The B Series delivers unparalleled accuracy in the inspection of fine-scale components.
features: Satisfies the full-range measurement requirements for high-density, high-precision products, including silicon-based carrier boards, micro-sized holes, line widths/spacings, Mini-LEDs, IC carrier boards, and more
Advanced stroboscopic synchronous electric control system
Dual-axis linear motion system
Includes advanced and comprehensive metrology assessment
Fully automated programming functions, SPC, and more

title: Vision Series U
description: Versatile imaging solution for general-purpose quality control applications. The Vision Series U offers an excellent balance of performance and affordability for diverse inspection needs.
features: High-speed, full-panel inspection of PCBs, FPCs, HDIs, IC substrates, and 3C products
5–10× faster than traditional vision systems with full 2.5D capability
FlashPro software with CAD import, SPC, image stitching, and offline programming
Fast setup and simplified programming for high-mix, high-throughput production
